at.ac.tuwien.mmue_lm7.game.resources

Class SoundSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.mmue_lm7.game.resources.SoundSystem

  • public class SoundSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods to (un)load audio files and play them Muted setting is stored in preferences
    Author:
    simon
